text:
Nick Jonas has a fourth album on the way, and now we know what it might sound.

The former Jonas Brothers multi-instrumentalist has dropped “Remember I Told You” featuring his go-to writer Mike Posner (“I Took a Pill in Ibiza”) and Anne-Marie (from Clean Bandit’s ”Rockabye”).

Related Nick Jonas Exits CAA for WME

Explore Explore Nick Jonas See latest videos, charts and news See latest videos, charts and news

It’s the lead track to Jonas’ next full-length set and the followup to Last Year Was Complicated, which reached No. 2 on the Billboard 200. We last heard from Jonas on “Bom Bidi Bom,” his collaboration with Nicki Minaj for the Fifty Shades Darker soundtrack which dropped in February.

Check out “Remember I Told You” below.
title: Stream Nick Jonas’ New Single ‘Remember I Told You’

We last heard from Jonas on "Bom Bidi Bom,” his collaboration with Nicki Minaj for the Fifty Shades Darker soundtrack which dropped in February. Check out “Remember I Told You” below.
